column5: god, everything about it. this could have been THE MOVIE but we only got to see a fraction of it. anyway, unrelated but who‘s gonna travel to transylvania with me? I‘ve got some, uhm, buisness to do in some salt mines

my favourite alien movie, but arguably the worst of the trilogy (the 4th doesn’t exist pls and thank you)
this could have been phenomenal, and I like to pretend that it is :)
self-explanatory, this movie is a mess. there is a lot of good stuff in it tho, it’s just hidden under layers and layers of mess
